ComicInfo.Summary:
Rapture tries to convince Super Patriot to take over as leader of Freak Force but he refuses the position. Elsewhere we see that Inhabitor has kidnapped Phyllis and is keeping her and Dart captive in his basement. At the mall Mighty Man tries to stop a freak called Bludgeon Mighty Man is defeated resulting in Freak Force arriving to take him down. He fights Freak Force and during the battle reveals that it was Johnny Redbeard who turned him into a freak. Freak Force is defeated and Horridus runs off to find help for her fallen friends.
Contains a Star Poster by Ben Herrera and Mike Christian
